Constants.html#/c:@NKPaymentsUserKey.name: NKPaymentsUserKey
Constants.html#/c:@NKPaymentsUserKey.abstract: The key used to fetch the pyaments settings of a user.

Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.name: cardBrand
Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.abstract: The brand of the default card of the user.

Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.name: cardLast4
Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.abstract: The last 4 numbers of the default card.

Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.name: trialEndsAt
Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.abstract: If the user is in a trial period, the end of the trial.

Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.name: -initWithDictionary:
Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html#/c:ob.abstract: Initializes a user payments settings object with the dictionary returned by the api.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: stripeId
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: The id of the subscription in Stripe.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: stripePlan
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: The name of the Stripe plan of the subscription.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: valid
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: Return true if the subscription is already valid.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: onTrial
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: Return true if the subscription is in the trial period.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: inGracePeriod
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: Return true if the subscription is in grace period, it has been cancelled but it’s not expired yet.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: cancelled
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: Return true if the subscription has been cancelled.

Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.name: -initWithDictionary:
Classes/NKSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs)N.abstract: Initializes a subscription with the dictionary returned by the api.

Classes/NKPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPur.name: -initWithDictionary:
Classes/NKPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPur.abstract: Initializes a purchase with the dictionary returned by the api.

Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.name: +createCustomerForCurrentUserWithSuccess:Failure:
Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.abstract: Creates a customer in Nooko for the current authenticated user.

Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.name: +createSubscription:Token:DiscountCode:TrialDays:Quantity:Meta:Success:Failure:
Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.abstract: Creates a subscription for the current authenticated user.

Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.name: +cancelSubscription:Success:Failure:
Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.abstract: Cancels a subscription and put it in the grace period if it’s not expired yet.

Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.name: +resumeSubscription:Success:Failure:
Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.abstract: Resumes a subscription if it’s in the grace period.

Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.name: +createCardWithToken:Success:Failure:
Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.abstract: Creates a card with a Stripe credit card token. If this is the first card for the user it will be set as default.

Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.name: +getCardsWithSuccess:Failure:
Classes/NKPayments.html#/c:objc(cs)NKPay.abstract: Retrieves the cards of the current authenticated user.

Classes/NKCard.html#/c:objc(cs)NKCard(py.name: expirationMonth
Classes/NKCard.html#/c:objc(cs)NKCard(py.abstract: The month of expiration of the card.

Classes/NKCard.html#/c:objc(cs)NKCard(py.name: expirationYear
Classes/NKCard.html#/c:objc(cs)NKCard(py.abstract: The year of expiration of the card.

Classes/NKCard.html#/c:objc(cs)NKCard(im.name: -initWithDictionary:
Classes/NKCard.html#/c:objc(cs)NKCard(im.abstract: Initializes a card with the dictionary returned by the api.

Classes/NKPayments.html.name: NKPayments
Classes/NKPayments.html.abstract: The main class used to interact with Nooko Payments. All the calls have to be made with an user authenticated and will return the setting for that user.

Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html.name: NKUserPaymentSettings
Classes/NKUserPaymentSettings.html.abstract: This objects represents the payments settings of a user. It’s returned only if a customer is created for the user.
